books.author: by Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: The 28th book in the Jack Reacher series. It’s 1992 and Reacher looks into the cause of a string of mysterious deaths.
books.name: THE SECRET

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: In a sequel to “The Firm,” Mitch McDeere, who is now a partner at the world’s largest law firm, gets caught up in a sinister plot.
books.name: THE EXCHANGE

books.author: by Ana Huang
books.description: The third book in the Kings of Sin series. The trophy wife of a Wall Street tycoon decides to put herself first.
books.name: KING OF GREED

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Jesmyn Ward
books.description: Annis, who was sold by the white enslaver who fathered her, tries to comfort herself with memories of her mother and stories of her African warrior grandmother.
books.name: LET US DESCEND

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Three daughters, who return to their family orchard in the spring of 2020, learn about their mother’s relationship with a famous actor.
books.name: TOM LAKE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Hannah Grace
books.description: The second book in the Maple Hills series. Two summer camp counselors who previously had a one-night stand may run afoul of the camp’s rules.
books.name: WILDFIRE

books.author: by Hannah Grace
books.description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.
books.name: ICEBREAKER

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The private detective Holly Gibney investigates whether a married pair of octogenarian academics had anything to do with Bonnie Dahl’s disappearance.
books.name: HOLLY

books.author: by Hanya Yanagihara
books.description: Four college friends, one with a traumatic past, move to New York seeking fame and fortune.
books.name: A LITTLE LIFE

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 33rd book in the Prey series. Davenport and Flowers investigate the murder of a federal judge and his two young sons.
books.name: JUDGMENT PREY
